abstract: The maximum version of PencilKit to support.
overview:
## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKContentVersion/latest].

If you set this property to a value less than [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKContentVersion/latest], the tool picker limits the tools that are available so they’re compatible with the version of PencilKit you specify.

If you set this property, also set [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKCanvasView/maximumSupportedContentVersion] on the [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKCanvasView] you use.

# maximumSupportedContentVersion

**Instance Property**

The maximum version of PencilKit to support.

## Declaration

```swift
var maximumSupportedContentVersion: PKContentVersion { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKContentVersion/latest].

If you set this property to a value less than [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKContentVersion/latest], the tool picker limits the tools that are available so they’re compatible with the version of PencilKit you specify.

If you set this property, also set [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKCanvasView/maximumSupportedContentVersion] on the [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKCanvasView] you use.
title: maximumSupportedContentVersion
